body.name: Elegant Comfort 12-Piece Bed-in-a-Bag, Ella Pleated Ruched Pintuck Comforter Set, 6-Piece Sheet Set Featuring Smart Pockets, Matching Decorative Pillows, All Season Bedding, Queen, Mint Green
body.stockDetail: Only 7 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 2 hrs 56 mins
features: COMPONENTS & SIZE- Queen 12-Piece Ella Collection includes: (1) Comforter, 90" x 90", (2) Shams, 20" x 26", (1) Flat Sheet, 90" x 102"+ 4", (1) Fitted Sheet, 60" x 80"+14", (4) Pillowcases, 20" x 30", and (3) Decorative Pillows.

ELEGANT & MODERN DESIGN- Elegant Comfort 12-Piece Set will be ideal for any interior design. This bed-in-a-bag is an excellent addition to your bedroom and will bring a vibrant touch to your style. Super-plush to keep you warm all year round. Suitable for all ages.

QUALITY CRAFTSMANSHIP- Our Ella Bed-in-a-Bag is crafted with firm stitching to prevent filling from shifting and bunching, therefore providing an even layer of warmth. Stain, shrink, and wrinkle resistant fabric. Soft and a cozy feel.

CARE INSTRUCTIONS- If cared for correctly, your comforter set can last years without any visible wear and tear. Please note that your comforter set will be vacuum sealed upon arrival. After opening the sealed package, allow up to 24 hours for your comforter and decorative pillows to fully fluff. Machine wash cold on a delicate cycle. Tumble dry low (or air dry). DO NOT BLEACH.

OEKO-TEX 100 STANDARD CERTIFIED- All our products are STANDARD 100 by OEKO-TEX. According to the guidelines, these products are tested for harmful substances and produced in an environmentally friendly and socially responsible manner. Each fabric batch is also tested for various durability features such as no-pilling, low shrinkage, color fastness, etc. Then they are stitched, individually inspected to be defect free and finally, packed for sales.
body.description: Soft, cozy and modern Ella Ruched Ruffled Bed-in-a-Bag. Our Elegant Comfort 12-Piece Set will come with a 6-piece sheet set and matching decorative pillows. This beautiful, ruched comforter includes a sophisticated pinched detail to bring life to your bedroom. Available in several colors and sizes to help you coordinate with your interior design. Soft and plush to keep you warm all year round. Quality craftsmanship, promising firm stitching to prevent filling from shifting and bunching. Please note that your comforter set will be vacuum sealed upon arrival. For the ultimate nights rest, allow up to 24-hours for your comforter and pillows to fully fluff. Doing so will provide a cloud-like sleeping experience, making it impossible to get out of bed every morning. Our products are OEKO-TEX 100 STANDARD CERTIFIED. Featuring fitted sheets with double-sided storage pockets. Ideal to keep your bedtime materials within reach. You can store your glasses, books, remote controls, cell phones, etc. Machine wash cold with like colors on a delicate cycle. Tumble dry low (or air dry). DO NOT BLEACH.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Us We import many items from many different countries such as China, India, Pakistan, Turkey, Egypt and Portugal. Elegant Comfort's reputation for consistent quality, innovative design, and reliability have enabled the company to grow and flourish in a market that has seen major changes in the participants as well as distribution. Our main products includes home collection and hotel collection such as: sheet sets, duvet cover sets, comforter sets, quilted coverlet sets, bed skirts, decorative pillows, memory foam products, throw & blankets, mattress pads, mattress protectors, furniture protectors, bed ensembles, bed in a bag, and shower curtains.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was always skeptical about purchasing a comforter online but to my surprise this was beautiful, the material is very nice and super soft. Definitely worth the money!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a beautiful comfortir set. Its soft and thin enough for summer. Its not nearly long enough. It looks more like a bedspread in the picture, but it definately needs a bed skirt

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Length in picture is deceiving
reviews.reviewText: Overall I am happy with this comforter set, but the picture is deceiving. I was expecting the comforter to be extra long on the sides and bottoms and come close to touching the floor. However, it only is about the length of the mattress. I guess I should have pulled out a tape measure. Other that than, it is pretty and soft.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 12 Piece Ruched Comforter Set
reviews.reviewText: This is one of the best and luxury comforter set that ive ever got in my life. Very happy with this purchase. I love this 12 piece set. it comes with smart sheets as well! if you are looking for a nice quality set and super soft this is a great buy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Everything fit great!
reviews.reviewText: This is a good comforter set love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I just love it...... it is perfect for me.

reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Box looked repackaged & blue stain on sheet
reviews.reviewText: Did not like upon opening there was a apparent blue stain on one of the sheets spent a lot of money on this for it to already have a stain
